exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x : Z_Zp The term "x" has type "Z_Zp" while it is expected to have type "nat".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference list_an_in was not found in the current environment.
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x : Z_Zp The term "Z_Zp" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "{x : ?A | ?P x}".

original: unfold In. unfold Zp_list. apply in_map_iff. exists (nat2Zp x). split. - apply list_an_in. rewrite Z_Zp. apply (proj2_sig Z_Zp). - reflexivity.
